channel.title: Productivity on Kevin Cui
channel.description: Recent content in Productivity on Kevin Cui

item.title: Be prepared! Interruption is coming!
item.description: Photo by Mark Hunter By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail. - Benjamin Franklin Recently I read an interesting article about Why do programmers wear headphones?. The truth is that “programmers are easily distracted, headphones eliminate some distractions, thus headphones make programmers.” To reduce losing attention by distractions, I could improve my attention span and control the working environment around myself. But on the other hand, I could lose my attention as well by interruptions, which are usually unexpected.
